main event: A control tower operator at Mehrabad Airport in Tehran observed a bright, circular light moving in the sky for approximately 50 minutes.
interesting points: The light was estimated to be 3 to 4 times brighter than Venus., The light hovered and then accelerated rapidly, disappearing from view., A jet interceptor was scrambled but lost contact when the object accelerated away., The light appeared to dim and brighten intermittently during the observation., Information was sent to the Defense Intelligence Agency for further evaluation.
witness description: control tower operator at Mehrabad Airport
